subject: More on this,

You know, if it were not for Edison, before all this technology, and now  
all you other's that carry this on now, we would now be thinking this was all 
 hoax, at least thank God for Edison bringing it out there in his time!sf
 
check this one out from 2 years ago. 
_http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JZ0pEUqZ0c8&NR=1_ (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JZ0pEUqZ0c8&NR=1)
